## ResourceTools.IResourceEditorFactory interface

Factory interface for creating type-specific resource editors. Allows ResolutionView to provide custom editing experiences for different resource types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IResourceEditorFactory<T = unknown, TV extends JsonCompatible<T> = JsonCompatible<T>> 
```

</td><td>

Attempts to create a resource editor for the given resource.
